TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(object sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks При создании делегата необходимо указать метод, обрабатывающий событие.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Чтобы связать событие с обработчиком событий, нужно добавить в событие экземпляр делегата.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Обработчик событий вызывается всякий раз, когда происходит событие, если делегат не удален.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. ## Examples В следующем примере кода показано открытие потока для записи данных для загрузки.The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] Следующий метод вызывается, когда доступен поток.The following method is called when the stream is available. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
